thread.section_title: Kyriad Paris 10 - Canal Saint Martin - Republique - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Bad experience
thread.title_full: Bad experience - Review of Kyriad Paris 10 - Canal Saint Martin - Republique, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Louise H
title: Bad experience
text:
The hotel bed very itcy. Towel is yellow. Internet network cant use most off the time. Rude staff in day timing.
In a very dark smallback street.
Room is small but that was not the case.
Unsafe as u have to hand over ur key to counter when u go out.
No safe box
Alot more. I think the main few point i had cover. But still
Many ppl book due to the rate is cheap, anyway cheap dont come with good staff
